Sect.Heading: PDF Test Document – Forms
Sect.Normal: Creating accessible forms for PDF has to be completed in PDF but here are some examples of forms. Labels created in Word, form elements added in PDF. To meet accessibility, the “tootip” information in the properties box must be filled out.
Sect.Heading: Created in PDF Non-accessible (no tooltip information added)
Created in PDF Accessible (tootip information added)
